title: Pork cooked with milk, cinnamon, bay and lemon
ingredients: 2kg-3kg/4lb 4oz - 6lb 10oz pork loin, French trimmed with the chine bone removed (you can ask your butcher to do this)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 onions, peeled and cut into quarters
2-2.5litres/3 pints 10fl oz - 4 pints 8fl oz full fat milk (enough to cover the pork completely)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
4 tbsp fresh flatleaf parsley, roughly chopped
